au.gov.sbr.core.requester.model
Class BusinessDocument

java.lang.Object
  au.gov.sbr.core.requester.model.BusinessDocument

public final class BusinessDocument
extends java.lang.Object

This class handles all the properties and fields required for the generation of a Business Document for the SBR Core Services Requester.
